summary: I took the work done by Nausicaa on the Schatten Lauf armor and made a slider set for use in Caliente's BodySlide 2 utility. Both of those mods are required.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][color=#FF0000]This mod requires the following mods:[/color][/size][/b]

Schatten lauf Armor - CBBE By Nausicaa : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29031] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29031 [/url]

BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by Caliente : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015 [/url]

[b][size=4][color=#FF0000]What this mod does[/color][/size][/b]

This mod only adds the ability to modify the Schatten Lauf armor in BodySlide 2, so the armor should fit your body types that you make in BodySlide 2.

I also added a zap panty option for the armor as I use different mods for my player's underwear.

[b][size=4][color=#FF0000]How do I use this?[/color][/size][/b]

Assuming you used NMM to install the required items, you should be able to just use NMM to install this.

Specifics on how to use BodySlide 2 are best found at BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by Caliente : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015[/url]

[b][size=4][color=#FF0000]Permissions[/color][/size][/b]

Feel free to use as you desire.

The original author (KURESE) had a free to use permission on their Oblivion armor, which led to the CBBE conversion by Nausicaa, and ultimately this slider set.

[b][size=4][color=#FF0000]Credits[/color][/size][/b]

KURESE - Original armor here: [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/32413]http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/32413[/url]
Nausicaa - For the CBBE conversion
Caliente - For the BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio
Ousnius - For the BodySlide 2 Tutorial
Bethesda - For the Elder Scroll series
author: DEW
